title: [Large-Scale] Virtual Environment-Based Science Assessment Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and experimental design experience
context.additional_context: A course comprehensively evaluating science concept understanding and inquiry skills through virtual environment assessments using smartphones, emphasizing practical evaluation methods that address limitations of traditional multiple-choice assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of formulating and validating scientific hypotheses in virtual environment simulations.
Learners can design and execute experiments in virtual environments to analyze scientific problems linked to social phenomena.
Learners can measure scientific thinking and problem-solving skills using VR/AR-based assessment tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
